data.title: Great food for Fast Food
data.text: For a Fast Food and a chain, this place is spectacular and relatively healthy. My family loves the chicken, beans and rice. The salads are great and the salsas too! I think that whatever you choose to eat here you won't be disappointed.

data.title: Usually excellent chicken
data.text: I order the same thing every time and at other locations usually. I have the chicken breast and wing, side broccoli and salad. I do not eat the tortilla's. I find this restaurant to be not as clean as other locations. The food was acceptable and the overall experience was satisfactory. I would go back.

data.title: My fave for fast food in La Mesa!
data.text:
As far as fast food goes, I love El Pollo Loco.  This is a favorite location when I am visiting my folks.  It sits on this corner that makes it a little weird to get in and out of but it consistently serves good food and is clean, with a nice staff.

Again, this IS fast food people but my favorite here is the Avocado Quesadilla or the Pollo Bowl.  I can't get beyond these two items as I love them so much.
